SEARCH
Package controller.AppointmentControllers

Class DoctorAppointmentControllerImpl

java.lang.Object
controller.AppointmentControllers.DoctorAppointmentControllerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppointmentController, DoctorAppointmentController
public class DoctorAppointmentControllerImpl extends Object implements DoctorAppointmentController
The DoctorAppointmentControllerImpl class provides concrete implementations of methods for doctors to manage appointments. It interacts with the AppointmentManager to perform operations such as retrieving appointments, handling appointment requests, and adding available slots. This class follows the Singleton design pattern, ensuring only one instance exists.
